verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H935><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and besieged <S%H6696><s%> it.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Ashpenaz <S%H828><s%> the master <S%H7227><s%> of his eunuchs, <S%H5631><s%> that he should bring <S%H935><s%> certain of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and of the king's <S%H4410><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and of the princes; <S%H6579><s%>

Children <S%H3206><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> blemish, <S%H3971><s%> but well <S%H2896><s%> favored, <S%H4758><s%> and skillful <S%H7919><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and cunning <S%H3045><s%> in knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> science, <S%H4093><s%> and such as had ability <S%H3581><s%> in them to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the king's <S%H4428><s%> palace, <S%H1964><s%> and whom they might teach <S%H3925><s%> the learning <S%H5612><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Chaldeans. <S%H3779><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> appointed <S%H4487><s%> them a daily <S%H3117><s%> provision <S%H1697><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> meat, <S%H6598><s%> and of the wine <S%H3196><s%> which he drank: <S%H4960><s%> so nourishing <S%H1431><s%> them three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> that at the end <S%H7117><s%> thereof they might stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Now God <S%H430><s%> had brought <S%H5414><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> into favor <S%H2617><s%> and tender love with the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs. <S%H5631><s%>

And the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> I fear <S%H3373><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has appointed <S%H4487><s%> your meat <S%H3978><s%> and your drink: <S%H4960><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> should he see <S%H7200><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> worse <S%H2196><s%> liking than <S%H4480><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are of your sort? <S%H1524><s%> then shall you make me endanger <S%H2325><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> to the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> to Melzar, <S%H4453><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> had set <S%H4487><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Mishael, <S%H4332><s%> and Azariah, <S%H5838><s%>

Prove <S%H5254><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, ten <S%H6235><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and let them give <S%H5414><s%> us vegetables <S%H2235><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Then let our countenances <S%H4758><s%> be looked <S%H7200><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> you, and the countenance <S%H4758><s%> of the children <S%H3206><s%> that eat <S%H398><s%> of the portion <S%H6598><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> meat: <S%H6598><s%> and as you see, <S%H7200><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> with your servants. <S%H5650><s%>
So he consented <S%H8085><s%> to them in this <S%H2088><s%> matter, <S%H1697><s%> and proved <S%H5254><s%> them ten <S%H6235><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And at the end <S%H7117><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> their countenances <S%H4758><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> fairer <S%H2896><s%> and fatter <S%H1277><s%> in flesh <S%H1320><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> which did eat <S%H398><s%> the portion <S%H6598><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> meat. <S%H6598><s%>

Thus Melzar <S%H4453><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> away the portion <S%H6598><s%> of their meat, <S%H6598><s%> and the wine <S%H3196><s%> that they should drink; <S%H4960><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them vegetables. <S%H2235><s%>

As for these <S%H428><s%> four <S%H702><s%> children, <S%H3206><s%> God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them knowledge <S%H4093><s%> and skill <S%H7919><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> learning <S%H5612><s%> and wisdom: <S%H2451><s%> and Daniel <S%H1840><s%> had understanding <S%H995><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> and dreams. <S%H2472><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> with them; and among them all <S%H3605><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> like Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Mishael, <S%H4332><s%> and Azariah: <S%H5838><s%> therefore stood <S%H5975><s%> they before <S%H6440><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>
